title: udana dhIm tanana (t)
sahitya:
udana dhIm tanana tillillAna tanadhIm dhiranA dhiranA tana
udana dhIm tanana tillillAna tanadhIm dhirana dhirana tana
udana dhIm tanana tillillAna tanadhIm dhiranA dhiranA tanana


anupallavi

  tajhaNu tadhimi taka takundari kiTajham tajham tarItajham dhIm takiTa
tajhaNu tadhimi taka takundari kiTajham tatajham tatari taritajham dhIm takiTa
tajhaNu tadhimi taka takundari kiTajham tatajham tatari takundari jham takadhimi jhamtaka
tajhaNu tadhimi taka takundari kiTajham takundarijham takadhimi jham takundarijham kiTa
tajhaNu tadhimi taka takundari kiTajham takajhaNu tatikiTajham taka tatikiTa jham tatikiTa jham


caraNam 1    ennividhamuga ninnu dalacitini manninci ElukO kannatalli karuNAkari hATaka mAlyAbharaNi madhukara vENi
tAm taritajham pA gA mA ri tajham nI dhA nI tarita kiTajham taritajham dha ni sa ri takadhittaLAngu takadhimi
tatikiTatOm dhittaLAngu takadhimi tatikiTatO taLAngu takadhimi tatikiTatOm
    caraNam 2    takiTajham tajham takundarikiTa tatarijham tajham takundarita dha ni ga rI 
takiTajham pa dha ni sa udanadhIm tajhaNu tAm ni dha ma pa dha ni
				(tisram)
tajhaNu tarita takajham tari taddhittOm takatiku tadingiNatOm taddhittOm 
takatiku tadingiNatOm taddhittOm takatiku tadingiNatOm
